name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience in building robust applications and systems across multiple industries. Expert in **AWS**, with a solid grasp of utilizing **CI/CD pipelines** and implementing **Microservices** architecture for scalable solutions. Proficient in **GitLab** for version control and collaboration, as well as adept in working with various **Databases**.

Strong background in programming languages including **Golang**, **Kotlin**, and **PHP**, enhancing backend capabilities. Skilled in JavaScript/TypeScript and Python, with practical experience in **FastAPI** and **Django** for capable backend development. Proven ability in delivering high-performance applications with a focus on compliance-driven development, ensuring adherence to standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Demonstrated expertise in building AI/ML-powered platforms, and implementing event-driven architectures.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed high-performance backend solutions in **Golang** and **PHP**, implementing efficient microservices architecture to enhance system scalability and maintainability, reducing deployment time by **30%**.
• Designed robust and scalable **AWS** cloud infrastructure, optimizing resource usage and improving uptime to **99.9%** through the use of **CI/CD** pipelines and automated testing.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate various **databases** including PostgreSQL and MongoDB, ensuring high availability and consistency of data across multiple services.
• Managed source code and version control effectively using **GitLab**, ensuring seamless collaboration among team members and maintaining code quality through continuous integration practices.
• Enhanced application performance by implementing Caching strategies for **databases**, substantiated by a **25%** improvement in response times.
• Conducted system architecture reviews, leading to the adoption of advanced microservices patterns that decreased system complexity by **40%** and supported easier feature rollouts.
• Mentored junior developers on best practices in **AWS**, microservices design, and deployment strategies, improving team productivity and code quality.
• Drove the adoption of **CI/CD** practices across projects, leading to a reduction in production bugs by **35%** and increasing deployment frequency to several times a day.
• Ensured seamless integration of various **databases** into a cohesive backend system, optimizing schema design and query performance for key applications.

Leveraged **AWS** and container orchestration tools in developing and deploying microservices, aligning with best practices for high-availability in financial applications.
Utilized **Golang** and **Kotlin** to enhance backend services, ensuring optimal performance and maintainability across various microservices with **CI/CD** pipelines integrated via **GitLab** for streamlined development and deployment.
Designed data storage solutions with relational and NoSQL **databases** to efficiently manage and query large datasets, ensuring data integrity and security across applications.
Collaborated in agile teams to optimize processes and improve code quality, reducing deployment times by **30%** while ensuring adherence to industry standards.
Implemented unit and integration testing strategies to enhance code reliability, achieving **95%** code coverage and minimizing post-deployment issues.
Developed comprehensive API documentation using Swagger, facilitating easier integration for internal and external developers across a team of **15** engineers.
Conducted performance tuning and monitoring using real-time logging and monitoring tools, reducing system downtime by **25%** and improving application response times significantly.

- Developed and optimized backend services using **Golang** and **Kotlin** for microservices architecture, ensuring high performance and scalability to support over **100,000** concurrent users on a global e-commerce platform.
- Designed, implemented, and maintained CI/CD pipelines with **GitLab** to automate testing and deployment processes, reducing deployment times by **40%**.
- Leveraged AWS services for hosting and managing applications, ensuring high availability across different regions and improving disaster recovery capabilities.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to integrate existing databases, utilizing **PostgreSQL** and **Redis** for caching mechanisms, thus enhancing data access speed by **30%** during peak transactional loads.
- Employed microservices architecture to enhance system modularity and maintainability, implementing features that improved overall system reliability by **25%**.
- Conducted regular code reviews and implemented best practices for version control with **Git**, fostering a culture of quality and innovation within the development team.
- Monitored and fine-tuned application performance, identifying bottlenecks under high load, leading to a **20%** reduction in latency across critical services while upholding service level agreements (SLAs).
- Implemented robust logging and monitoring solutions to track application health and performance in real-time, resulting in quicker incident response and resolution times.
- Participated in the design and planning of system architecture, focusing on the integration of scalable solutions, effectively aligning business requirements with technical capabilities.
